author: cmpilato
msg: More work on issue #3890 ("'svnrdump load' does not map revisions like
'svnadmin load' does").  This work just makes reading the code easier.
get_revision_mapping() instead of peeking directly into the hash.

author: zwoop
msg: TS-806 TS_ADDTO removes duplicates, so avoid this by using the -R option to libtool
